item.title: Sudan's civil war rages despite Trump administration's push for peace
item.description: Explosions were reported near Sudan's capital Khartoum just hours after the RSF paramilitary forces said they agreed to a U.S.-backed truce proposal.

item.title: New U.S. strike on alleged drug boat kills3, death toll at 70
item.description: Pentagon chief Pete Hegseth released aerial footage of the latest strike, which he said took place in international waters like the previous attacks.

item.title: FAA order cutting thousands of flights kicks in as airlines scramble to comply
item.description: The FAA ordered airlines to cut thousands of flights as the agency deals with air traffic controller shortages during the government shutdown. The cut...

item.title: 11/6: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: FAA to cut flights at 40 major airports due to ongoing government shutdown; President Trump teases cutting off funds to NYC after saying he would "hel...

item.title: Evasive moves needed moments after 2 jets take off from LAX
item.description: American Airlines confirms the incident between one of its planes and an ITA plane at LAX last Friday.
